access_scores_pediatrics:ped_cnt.short_description: Count of pediatricians based on provider locations
access_scores_pediatrics:ped_cnt.long_description: Count of pediatricians based on provider locations. Address data were collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.

access_scores_pediatrics:ped_2sfca.long_name: Pediatric care geographic availability (2-step enhanced floating catchment areas)
access_scores_pediatrics:ped_2sfca.short_description: Index of pediatric care physician availability based on supply and demand of providers
access_scores_pediatrics:ped_2sfca.long_description: Pediatric care availability based on 2-step enhanced floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of pediatricians per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a provider is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for pediatricians (population under 16). Provider address data were collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.
access_scores_pediatrics:ped_2sfca.statement: The pediatric care availability for {features.name} is {value}.
